messages: You have an odd dream about tortoises.
Your dreams give you a strange protected feeling.
You have a strange dream of retreating into a shell and staying there.
In your dream, you catch a distinctively tortoise-like image of yourself.
You are comforted by a dream of you being protected by your strong shell as predators try in vain to eat you.
You find it hard to wake from your peaceful dream of basking in the sun.
You feel safe knowing that no matter how fast everything else may be, your shell will protect you.
You have a long life ahead of you. Time to take it slow.
